channel.title: CVE Feed for Mintplex-Labs -- vector-admin

item.title: CVE-2024-0879|2024-08-01T18:18:18.898Z -- mintplex-labs -- vector-admin
item.description: Authentication bypass in vector-admin allows a user to register to a vector-admin server while “domain restriction” is active, even when not owning an authorized email address.
